question: reward for breastfeeding...i left breast feeding my baby less than in a year. Is that what i did was wrong. Will i get rewarded for the short time period i breastfeed my baby
answer:
QUESTION
i read somewhere that if the mother gets stress or tension while breastfeeding it'll affect the child later on. My inlaws used to blame me for one thing or the other & i used to worry & get tensed about it & couldnt help it. So i left breast feeding my baby less than in a year. Is that what i did was wrong. Will i get rewarded for the short time period i breastfeed my baby. Please pray for me & reply to me in detail.
ANSWER


Share:
The status of the mother is very high in the sight of Allah. Whatever she does for her child, she will be rewarded immensely for it.

We are not aware of the child being affected by being breastfed when the mother is under pressure or stressed.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
